page.signin.kick.keeps_saying_incorrect: JoprojÄm saÅ†em "Username or password is incorrect"?
If you keep getting "Username or password is incorrect" even though you know that it is correct, then you do not have a mobile login yet. To create one, simply reset your password and reuse your current password. This fixes the login issue with both Casterlabs and the official Kick mobile app.

page.chat_bot.commands.examples.shoutout: Lets you shoutout another streamer. Usage: !shoutout <username>
page.chat_bot.commands.examples.song.des: Displays the current song you're listening to and provides a link. Usage: !song
page.chat_bot.commands.examples.where.de: Lists which platforms you are live on and provides links to your other accounts. Usage: !where

page.chat_bot.settings.hide_commands_fro: Makes Caffeinated hide all !commands and responses from the chat widget.
page.chat_bot.settings.hide_timers_from_: Makes Caffeinated hide all timer messages from the chat widget.

page.settings.appearance.zoom.descriptio: Makes Caffeinated's UI larger or smaller. Use with caution.
